==Abyssal Moon Spire==
===Floor 11===
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
**{{Color|Pyro DMG}} dealt by party members increased by 60%.
**{{Color|Hydro DMG}} dealt by party members increased by 60%.
*'''Additional Effects'''
**In Chamber 1's first half, the Hydro Abyss Mage has the '''Mist Bubble''' ({{Hydro}}) aura.
**In Chamber 1's second half, the Pyro Abyss Mage has the '''Pursuing Fireball''' ({{Pyro}}) aura.
**In Chamber 2's second half, the Dancing Thunder Kairagi has the '''Lightning Strike''' ({{Electro}}) aura and the Fiery Might Kairagi has the '''Pursuing Fireball''' ({{Pyro}}) aura.

===Floor 12===
*'''Ley Line Disorder'''
**For this floor only, the ley line flow will be normal.
*'''Additional Effects'''
**Chamber 1 first half has a {{Pyro}} [[Elemental Node]].
**In Chamber 2's second half first wave, the Cryo Cicin Mage has the '''Cryo Cage''' ({{Cryo}}) aura.
**In Chamber 2's second half second wave, the Mirror Maiden has the '''Mist Bubble''' ({{Hydro}}) aura.
**In Chamber 3, the Ruin Guard in the first half and Ruin Grader in the second half have the '''Rumbling Stone''' ({{Geo}}) aura.
